hero.name: Thrall
hero.specialAbility: At end of turn, place 1 totem in any space unoccupied by opposing fighters and in Thrall's range (max 4 in play at any time). When an opposing fighter occupies a totem's space, destroy that totem. To play a totem card, Thrall must also be in range of at least 1 totem.

deck.title: Earth shock
deck.immediateText: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

deck.title: Lightning Bolt
deck.afterText: You may place 1 totem in an eligible space. If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

deck.title: totemic recall
deck.basicText: Destroy up to 4 totems on the board. Recover 1 health for each destroyed totem. Then search your deck and discard pile for a totem card (not including TOTEMIC RECALL) and add it to your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

deck.title: elemental mastery
deck.basicText: Add 1 to the value of the next attack card played this turn for each totem in Thrall's range. Gain 1 action.

deck.title: Flame Nova Totem
deck.basicText: Choose a totem in Thrall’s range. Deal 4 damage to all opposing fighters adjacent to the chosen totem. Destroy that totem.

deck.title: Lightning Shield
deck.afterText: You may place 1 totem in an eligible space. If you lost the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

deck.title: Hail to the Chief
deck.duringText: Destroy up to 4 totems on the board. Add 1 to the value of this card for each destroyed totem.
deck.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

deck.title: Mana Tide Totem
deck.basicText:
If there is a totem in Thrall's range, choose 1 effect: 
- Draw 3 cards; keep 2 and discard 1 
- Discard 1 card; then search your deck for 1 card, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.

deck.title: Feral Wolf
deck.afterText: Move Thrall up to 3 spaces. You may move Thrall through spaces containing opposing fighters.

deck.title: Lightning Bolt
deck.afterText: You may place 1 totem in an eligible space. If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

deck.title: Earthbind Totem
deck.basicText: If there is a totem in Thrall’s range, you may play this card.
deck.afterText: If used when defending, the opposing player loses 1 action. If used when attacking, gain 1 action.

deck.title: Nature's Call
deck.basicText: You may place up to 4 totems on eligible spaces in Thrall’s range. If Thrall already has 1 or more totems on the board, destroy 1 before placing each new totem. If you draw this card to start the game, reshuffle and draw again.

deck.title: Hail to the Chief
deck.duringText: Destroy up to 4 totems on the board. Add 1 to the value of this card for each destroyed totem.
deck.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

deck.title: Hail to the Chief
deck.duringText: Destroy up to 4 totems on the board. Add 1 to the value of this card for each destroyed totem.
deck.afterText: If you won the combat, choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 2 spaces.

deck.title: Lightning Bolt
deck.afterText: You may place 1 totem in an eligible space. If you won the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

deck.title: Earthbind Totem
deck.basicText: If there is a totem in Thrall’s range, you may play this card.
deck.afterText: If used when defending, the opposing player loses 1 action. If used when attacking, gain 1 action.

deck.title: Feral Wolf
deck.afterText: Move Thrall up to 3 spaces. You may move Thrall through spaces containing opposing fighters.

deck.title: Elemental Guardian
Lightning Shield
deck.afterText: You may place 1 totem in an eligible space. If you lost the combat, deal 1 damage to the opposing fighter.

deck.title: Chain Lightning
deck.duringText: Deal 1 damage to an enemy fighter adjacent to the opposing fighter and 1 damage to an enemy fighter adjacent to that adjacent fighter.

deck.title: Feral Wolf
deck.afterText: Move Thrall up to 3 spaces. You may move Thrall through spaces containing opposing fighters.

deck.title: Elemental Guardian
Grounding Totem
deck.basicText: You must choose and then destroy a totem in Thrall's range to play this card.
deck.duringText: Prevent all damage.

deck.basicText: Add 1 to the value of the next attack card played this turn for each totem in Thrall's range. Gain 1 action.

deck.title: Chain Lightning
deck.duringText: Deal 1 damage to an enemy fighter adjacent to the opposing fighter and 1 damage to an enemy fighter adjacent to that adjacent fighter.
